lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone. Welcome to Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glad you guys could rush to your hotel room in time to make this happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you vote, and you can vote, you'll be gifted some cool digital surprises from D&D Beyond.

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: As a palate cleanser, let me introduce our moderator, the brilliant, the adorable, the impartial Ronin Willingham.

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: After Ronin's questions, each candidate will have 20 seconds to respond, and no, just because I am Sam's campaign manager, I will definitely not be showing him any favoritism.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hundo-P! Extra! Is my time done?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How am I doing on time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's been talking longer than 20 seconds!

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: You don't always know what time it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The tenets of Gygax will be hoisted to dizzying new heights.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I do a quick rebuttal? Yawn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rebuttal to your rebuttal, I will destroy you, Riegel! Destroy you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what, why don't you just go write 50 more comedy bits about your own anus? You Elon Musk clone! (bell ringing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Deep down you are still my number one, Sam Riegel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Riegel for President 2019. Prosecution rests. Boo yah! That's it.

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: Please forget this ever happened, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt's reactions to all these are way better than the bits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for giving us Ronin on loan temporarily, Laura and Travis. That was great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without further ado, let's go ahead and jump in to tonight's episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (growling noises) (water bubbling) (thunder) (explosion) ♪ Role, Critical Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical Critical ♪ ♪ Mighty Nein, Mighty Nein ♪ ♪ Roll the dice, roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware 'cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ (dramatic music) ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands, take a chance, ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call? ♪ ♪ Dig in deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn ♪ ♪ Your turn, your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing) (dragon roaring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the door opens, and Dairon pushes into the building, what do you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to alert the whole house, okay? Let's go upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can speak around it, "but I would prefer not to get in."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let us not meet at the hot tub."

lines.text: Okay. We'll just not meet at the hot tub.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Close the door behind. Dairon you can now see, as you're walking alongside and leading her, and she is nursing one arm a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a dangerous way to come across to Rosohna, "but I'll be all right."

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What are you doing here? "How do you have a house? "How are you staying outside as a human in Rosohna? "What have you been up to? "Why is there a tree on the roof?" (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, and I am asking you questions back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, I'm doing the exact same thing "I told you I was coming here to do, "which was to infiltrate and look for information "about some sort of connection between the Assembly "and possibly members of the Dynasty."

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Do you want me to leave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stay here in case, you know, I forget anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you just decided to buy some real estate "while you were around, and--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And why would the Bright Queen "of the Kryn Dynasty "provide you, a bunch of Empire folk, "a house so close to the Bastion?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they have the other ones, which is why this war is happening, on top of, I think, other things, like people in cahoots across both of the Empires.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The beacons, which I think is what you are talking about--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Even the Assembly would be hard pressed "to reach and escape with such artifacts."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think someone handed them over or staged it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To set up a war? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's possible, or to make a bunch of money, "or to gain favors in kind." (sighs) "I'm here because I'm trying to figure out "not just an Assembly's connection from them to here, but perhaps there was a mid-way person, somebody who "somebody on this end who had equal interests."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When conversing with the Bright Queen, she didn't seem to have any notion of wanting to relinquish any attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If these items, these artifacts could be returned, "that would be helpful in hopefully trying to prevent "any more bloodshed, but it is escalating at a pace that "I'm only hearing bits and pieces from back in the Empire."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: "And which side do you belong to?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you that when you first asked me if I even wanted to be an Expositor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then understand this path is a very difficult one."

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What side are you on? Do you have one? Is the Soul exclusive to the Empire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am on the side of civilization."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They raise a stern eyebrow in your direction, and with a slight skip-step forward, snatches one of the snacks out from one of your hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I put the bowl in front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts her hand up and denies it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't mind, it's okay, I like to share. It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you known me to be the type to ask nicely?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if she can be reasoned with, the Bright Queen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what-- That's what we do, right?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have our independent means of achieving "what we hope is a similar goal."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Looking to expunge whatever corruption "reaches between both sides of this conflict."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How long do you intend to stay in Rosohna?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would help me get closer to achieving my goals, "and we do not have to cross our directives."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then let me borrow it until you return."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am not looked at very kindly here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well if you intend to leave, I will "walk you to your point of exit, "to where you no longer require it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has been useful across the entire Empire--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm impressed by what you've managed to do in this time, "and probably with the help of your compatriots, "with the varied skill sets, I have "a handful of very powerful and honed capabilities, "but they are still limited."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We handed over a prized religious artifact of the Dynasty in order to achieve this type of favor, and any type of contacts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also so we wouldn't die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And I mean, you know, we've worked really hard to integrate ourselves and stuff, but the thing I'm a little worried about is that they don't actually trust us fully, so if anything happened--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This paltry trick can get me through the exterior "of various city outer limits, but interacting "towards the center or important areas, "it would not surprise me if such illusions "or transmutive properties would be dispelled or discarded, "and that would put me very quickly in a place "of no longer breathing, so--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Both of us have come this far."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you think would be the most useful way "to leave me behind to do my business "while go off and search for yours?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The plan was to potentially get him to Nicodranas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would have to discuss it with the others, especially Nott, but that could be a potential cause for your company.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At the very least, a keeper of the abode "so I'm not slinking in the shadows the entire time I'm here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, we can say we hired you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you go get a beer or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go take a dip in the hot tub, it's really relaxing.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if she's important to you, then maybe that's worth it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She could be a bigger risk just being in the city at odds, potentially, with our plans, or working against what we might be sowing in the Dynasty.

lines.text: But I thought she said she doesn't work for the Empire, right? She works for civilization, humanity? All of-- all of the world?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go out in the hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It'll be a harder-fought path for me, but "I don't wish to undo anything you've already set up."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think this war is about to get real bad.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, when I'm not here, you know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, my head hurts, I'm going to go lay down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all begin to rouse from your slumber and regather for what the next endeavor, the next path that lies before you and you discuss this, as you all have your breakfast, largely prepared by Caduceus, probably.

lines.text: Oh, you know, me and Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine, I mean, she's your friend, right?

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: "And hopefully with such an appointment, "would have a reasonable alibi, "should anyone inquire my reasoning for being here."

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will say that I was originally raised "here on the outskirts of Rosohna, "and I, you know, am a skilled keeper of homes, "and we had met not but a week beforehand, "myself needing work, and you being too busy to stay, "hired me to take care of it in your stead "while you are off handling whatever business "you're handling, of which did I not ask, "as a professional keeper of your home."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, it makes sense if we're sending Yeza to safety, that we hired security to just watch over the place in his stead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You may speak to Dairon, is that what you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything you're doing here is in coordination with the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About twice a week, to which we exchange "truncated information and updates."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we were to help you in Rosohna to fit in and give you shelter here, would you be able to offer the same sort of access back in the Empire, for us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We wish to do the same.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) "Should any of this information I have been given "prove to be false, should any of you have been "providing false information to Beauregard, "and any of you attempt to cross what she, I, "or any members of the Cobalt Soul are attempting, "you will be tried."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we're okay with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be careful who you share this with."

lines.text: Did you eat this growing up, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew, no, I always pushed it to the side, it looks so nasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Marion comes to join you and goes, "No, it's true, she was a very difficult eater."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So take one bite, and then you can be all done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the advantage, because you are his mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Begrudgingly, takes a bite of the seaweed salad and is like, "(groans)."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans) He's like, you can tell he doesn't mind it so much, but has to act the part, and then takes a bit of the fish, and actually seems to not mind the fish too much, and then sets the fork down with like, absolute aggression, across the plate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I give him a handful of geode crystals.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's what you get when you eat your veggies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your dad will give you even more cool stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeza's like, "(sighs), it's good to have you back." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll keep spoiling this child as long as I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So what's the plan for today?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't feel comfortable leaving Dairon alone at the house alone for long without any proper introductions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things arrive and we're not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have my pull around the establishment, "and to be fair, they owe me quite a bit, "so we can make sure it's taken care of."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, I'll grab Yeza and ask him to step aside with me, I suppose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to stay with you and Luc so badly, but I can't keep doing this spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I can see in your eyes that "you still have unfinished business."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because being here feels so wonderful, but.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you need me to tell to you leave?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But, you know, wow, we none of us thought we had "this kind of a destiny in us, huh?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were a prisoner of war!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want to go back to that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are so cool! Coolest parents ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, you're the head of the family now, so."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've been so supportive of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear Luc go, "What was that sound?" "Nothing!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We didn't have much growing up, you and me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So why shouldn't he have whatever he wants, at least for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I also have to make sure that, you know, "he grows up to appreciate it, too."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure, yeah, teach him all the right lessons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if he wants something, it's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to, when I come back, I hope to come back to visit, but I really hope that the next time that I come back, I won't need this anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep it, though, because I might like, start a collection of masks or something, so just like, put it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't really have a place to keep anything."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just might send you some stuff, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll go say goodbye to the boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go over and give Luc a big kiss, and say: Mommy's got to go on another trip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know, it-- it sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you going to go shoot more people?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I left some money for dad to get you some, like a training crossbow, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell him that if you're really good, he should take you practicing once a week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be good, be kind, be safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Make sure you remember all the things that you shoot "and tell me when you come back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hide my tears and go over to Caleb and just say: I'm ready.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the interest of time, can we say that on the walk back from the beach yesterday, I would have been able to pick up 150 gold worth of the chalks I would need to do--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will you help me do magic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, is there a better place? Should we do it right here, or perhaps somewhere more private?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leads you up into this antechamber based off of her main work quarters.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Luc, would you, well first, will you hold my cat for a second?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Veth, will you come over here, and I draw a third circle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of sit in their places.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's off doing big things, and she has a lot of assistants, nine of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're about to finish, Yeza comes in and just gives you a kiss before you leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take a couple of steps back from me, will you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go, here we go, here we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give my mom a big hug!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right as he's finishing up, Marion gives you a big hug, Jester, and says, "Take care of yourself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be back. We'll be back to see you really soon, okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit, I left the dress on the guest bed! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're all gathering, Fjord, you're about to step in there and you feel this like cold spike shoot through the back of your head for a moment, and a voice just gently caresses the inside of your ear that says, "Return." Right as you finish that step, the momentum, your eyes wide, the brain numb from the sudden moment where time seems to slow as you experience this, you step down, entering the circle, and (whooshes), all of you are heading towards?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, back to the Dynasty, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When Jester's mom was hugging her, did the teleportation circle go off and like just her arm got teleported? (laughter) It's just like a severed arm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She just got like Philadelphia Experimented? (laughter) No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't we go check on our house guest, for starters?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait for our things and get ready to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone different seem to be watching us in the arrival chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, from a distance from Nicodranas, I'd say it's probably early morning, though the sky is still dark with no sun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On that walk, telepathically, I ask my cat if he saw anything funky outside the Chateau last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you put in an order for the materials you required, and what did you put in the order for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Transportation with a cart, if available, a way of transporting, and camping supplies for cold weather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, camping supplies is doable, food and water, there is a two horses and a cart wagon waiting for you, already taken off to the side of the building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, enough for the travel and like a little bit of spending money also, if they have anything, but I had a funny feeling they weren't going to give us any spending money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He wouldn't have thought of anything fancy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just some augmentation to our current kit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys handle your introduction of Dairon to Essek?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or if he, I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, aside from messaging directly with Jester, the other other option would be to have to send a runner to go ahead and deliver a message, but it's up to you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Walk over to your house, you don't have to do it here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know where he lives?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have not been to Essek's place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured Essek would come with the delivery of the materials anyway, but that was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you ordered it while you were gone, they've already been brought, and Essek isn't going to be, you know, not going to escort your delivery supplies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's his title again? It's dope shit, what is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe, need to look it up again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we can stop by on the way out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a really cool sounding name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get this how on the road.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I just tell him that Dairon's here and somebody's watching the house, so don't you worry that there's a person here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're taking off and leaving the house in someone's care.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just say like hey, come here, we want to introduce you to our new--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To remind you, like, this journey you're taking, how are you doing this journey? The discussion when you were in the Lucid Bastion was Essek was going to take you there via magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should just tell him to come to the house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll send a message to Essek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Essek, come over please, we're going to leave and we need your help and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I throw down some ball bearings, see if any of them move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, I get into position so I have view of the ball bearings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Be really bad if he just banana peels.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get it with my Mage Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door opens, the chimes dingle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It seems you have made your preparations "and are ready to leave?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, you may enter and cross into the threshold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch the ball bearings actually separating out around his form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like there is some invisible force that is pushing them outward, and just generating this strange force that keeps them at bay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, did we leave the ball bearings on the floor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know who we should talk to about that? Our housekeeper, Dairon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Be more conscious to pick up all the ball bearings next time, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will not let this happen again."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Essek, of the Shadowhand? Right, is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a pleasure." He goes, "Ah, well, it is a pleasure to make "your acquaintance as well, Dairon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything needs handling while we're gone, this is a good point of contact for the house, or otherwise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Since we had to drop Yeza off, we figured it was smart to get a keeper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, have you gathered your things, "are you ready for your journey, then?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could call him the Hover Hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he didn't see the fucking water we put over the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is it just the seven of us?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And a horse and cart, if possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(chuckles) "Unfortunately, this particular magic "does not allow for such a cart to come." Let me double-check here to see if the horse can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why'd you get all this stuff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, we can carry a lot of it with us at least, but it seemed--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can bring you or the cart."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) We'll pack as much of the food and supplies as we can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's fine, we can use the horse later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From underneath the robe, the hand produces the map, that was requested.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) Thank you, Deven, for rushing that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This'll give you at least a brief overview of what the map contains for now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The last request I have is a destination."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Flotket Alps, and I believe it's on the other side of the Ivory Lake, if I'm not--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, I wrote down the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shadycreek Run, yeah, so it would be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we can't get immediately there, then I say Cinderrest Sanctum is the closest thing I can see on the map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This magic is a bit volatile, if--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somebody please roll a d100 for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I can do a 10 and a 10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, that seems just under or just over something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, what did he do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did Essek just kill the party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you all do suddenly take--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another d100 for me, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got it, you got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll pick up from there next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Fucking ready for this shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a lava lake? A lake of lava?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a lake of water, but the streams of molten rock are meeting the lake and causing steam to rise up as it cools into rock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All that snow got to go somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I had to prepare many locations based on what that teleportation roll was going to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it can end up throwing you to a similar area, which means you guys could've ended up in a volcano in another place in the world entirely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could've been just a slight off-kilter and thrown you guys into like, the Savalirwood, it could turn you all over--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would you do that to yourself, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly, that's half the fun of this game, man, the chaos.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How weird would it have been if we would've landed on a volcano where Traveler Con was being scouted?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I wish we'd gone there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, it would've been that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got like, I'll look at the timer again, but I think you have like two months or so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got to register for your badge like right away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hotel rooms go fast, you got to get in that lottery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On Ebay for like, so much gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll just keep the swag bag--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boo! That's a Sam Riegel-worthy joke.
